tosdr.case: Per the service's terms, users may not express negative opinions about them

title: Per the service's terms, users may not express negative opinions about them
quoteText: YOUR SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE RIGHT AND REMEDY IN CASE OF DISSATISFACTION WITH THE WEB SITE, MOBILE APPLICATION AND/OR THE SERVICES OR ANY OTHER GRIEVANCE, SHALL BE YOUR DISCONTINUATION OF ACCESS TO OR UtilizATION OF THE WEB SITE AND/OR THE SERVICES.
